title: Singer Halsey goes ‘Instagram official’ with new boyfriend Evan Peters
text:

Singer Halsey has made her romance with American Horror Story actor Evan Peters ‘ Instagram Official’ after the pair were seen leaving a Halloween bash hand in hand.

The pair were seen exiting Halsey’s Almost Famous party in Los Angeles on Friday night wearing matching couple costumes, cementing rumours that they were an item.

Sporting an edgy red wig, the 25-year-old singer wore full white face paint and sexy thigh-high boots, with Evan, 32, opting for a similar style ‘mask’.

Taking to Instagram, Halsey shared a photo of herself and Evan, captioning the post “resident goths” and tagging Marilyn Manson, the inspiration behind their couple costume.

Halsey channeled Marilyn Manson's late 1990s glam look, paying tribute to his unforgettable mannequin-like cover art for the 1998 album, Mechanical Animals.

She completed her look with a bright red wig, elaborate blue eye makeup, and a white patent leather body suit with matching thigh-high boots.

Her new boyfriend turned up for Halsey’s annual bash dressed as an Insane Clown Posse fan, known as Juggalos.

(Image: NEMO/ CPR/ D. SANCHEZ / BACKGRID)

Confirmation of the romance comes just days after Halsey and Evan were spotted enjoying a cosy and hands-on lunch together in Sherman Oaks, California.

That sighting came weeks after they were spotted together on a roller coaster at Six Flags, with Halsey affectionately touching Evan’s face and laughing flirtatiously.

Speaking to E!, a source revealed: “Halsey has always been a huge fan of Evan's. A friend connected them and they had also been chatting over social media before hanging out.

“It's still very new, but they are both interested in dating each other and hanging out.”
